name: Fancy Cakes in Space
description:
A little thing for Potluck Party 2019 on Glorious Trainwrecks that makes no sense at all. It's really just a doodle. Float around on a spacewalk looking at the nice cakes. Collect stars if you feel like it. If you're in a gamey mood you can collect stars for half an hour and you'll get a final score. Not sure why anyone would do that particularly but it's there.

Controls: Z key

Sound credits:
https://freesound.org/people/genghis%20attenborough/sounds/40151/
https://freesound.org/people/Tristan/sounds/19460/
